languages.text: "Если бы мне давали трон каждый раз, когда я отвечаю отказом на мольбу, я бы мог купить ваш флагман". {n}Соломон потирает переносицу.{/n} "Ради вашей же сохранности — оставьте эту идею".
"If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."
languages.original_text: "Если бы мне давали трон каждый раз, когда я отвечаю отказом на мольбу, я бы мог купить ваш флагман". {n}Соломон потирает переносицу.{/n} "Ради вашей же сохранности — оставьте эту идею".

traits.locale_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

"If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

languages.text: 「嘆願を断るたびに玉座を一つ得ていたなら、あなたの旗艦を買えるほどには貯まっていたでしょうね」{n}彼は鼻梁をこすりながらため息をついた。{/n}「そのような考えは捨てた方が身のためです」
languages.original_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

traits.locale_text: 「嘆願を断るたびに玉座を一つ得ていたなら、あなたの旗艦を買えるほどには貯まっていたでしょうね」{n}彼は鼻梁をこすりながらため息をついた。{/n}「そのような考えは捨てた方が身のためです」

languages.text: "Hätte ich jedes Mal einen Thron bekommen, wenn ich eine Bitte abgelehnt habe, könnte ich damit Euer Flaggschiff kaufen." {n}Er reibt sich über den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Zu Eurem eigenen Schutz, lasst diese Idee fahren."
languages.original_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte ich jedes Mal einen Thron bekommen, wenn ich eine Bitte abgelehnt habe, könnte ich damit Euer Flaggschiff kaufen." {n}Er reibt sich über den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Zu Eurem eigenen Schutz, lasst diese Idee fahren."

languages.text: « Si l'on me donnait un trône chaque fois que j'ignore une supplique, je serais assez riche pour m'offrir votre vaisseau amiral, {n}soupire-t-il en se pinçant l'arête du nez.{/n} Je vous conseille de renoncer à ce projet, pour votre propre bien. »
languages.original_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'on me donnait un trône chaque fois que j'ignore une supplique, je serais assez riche pour m'offrir votre vaisseau amiral, {n}soupire-t-il en se pinçant l'arête du nez.{/n} Je vous conseille de renoncer à ce projet, pour votre propre bien. »

languages.text: «Si me dieran un trono por cada vez que he rechazado una súplica, tendría suficiente para comprarme su nave insignia». {n}El Arbitrator se frota el puente de la nariz.{/n} «Por su propio bien, sáquese esa idea de la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

traits.locale_text: «Si me dieran un trono por cada vez que he rechazado una súplica, tendría suficiente para comprarme su nave insignia». {n}El Arbitrator se frota el puente de la nariz.{/n} «Por su propio bien, sáquese esa idea de la cabeza».

languages.text: “如果我每拒绝一次别人的请求，就能得到一枚王座币，那我攒下来的钱都够买下这艘旗舰了。”{n}他揉了揉鼻梁。{/n}“还是放弃这个想法吧，这是为了你自己的安全着想。”
languages.original_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."

traits.locale_text: “如果我每拒绝一次别人的请求，就能得到一枚王座币，那我攒下来的钱都够买下这艘旗舰了。”{n}他揉了揉鼻梁。{/n}“还是放弃这个想法吧，这是为了你自己的安全着想。”

languages.text: "Geri çevirdiğim her ricada bir taht edinebilseydim sancak geminizi satın alabilirdim." {n}Burun kemerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Kendi iyiliğiniz için ısrarınızdan vazgeçin."
languages.original_text: "If I had a throne for every time I turned down a plea, I would have enough to buy your flagship." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose.{/n} "For your own preservation, drop this idea of yours."
